entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
